text: "Sweet Home Chicago" is a blues standard first recorded by Robert Johnson in 1937. The song has become a popular anthem for the city of Chicago. Many artists have rerecorded the song such as B.B. King and Buddy Guy. Category:1930s songs Category:Blues music Category:Songs about Chicago Category:B.B. King songs Category:Buddy Guy songs Category:Robert Johnson (musician) songs Category:1936 works
title: Sweet Home Chicago
